Reviews.Title: “Deaming of Vegas”

Reviews.Content: arrived chicago midway airport short lay overnight stay stayed residence inn couple times call snow dressed chicago food issue arrived hotel found staff food drinks blessing fell welcomed minute walked door hotel clean comfotable stay highly recommend friends family stay maria staff

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Michele45030
Reviews.Content: arrived quick vacation wednesday night front desk extremely helpful explaining shuttle station airport information map chicago stations town welcomed informed shuttle airport nice free shuttle runs 20 min drivers friendly shuttle serve hotels complex plan extra time stops huge clean slept time hotel kids loved own tv pool huge clean warm woman breakfast fantastic actually table removed dirty plates happen breakfast stocked food finding hotel dark hotels finding correct driveway difficult stay heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: travelsmart568
Reviews.Content: stayed residence inn midway recent business trip frankly wasnt expecting didnt anticipate stay resulting tripadvisor review travel bit stayed property delightful staff check check employee hotel courteous friendly helpful arrived hours anticipated dinner delivery pizza chocolate bar bottom carryon suprised restaurants deliver 10 11 oclock night yes menus hotel clean comfortable light sleepers fan thermostat perfect drowning background noise

Reviews.Title: “Airport location much quieter and secluded than the Magnificent Mile one”
Reviews.Author: larabarccp
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights summer wonderful time ive stayed residence inns favorite marriott shuttle picked airport minutes walked door staff friendly accommodating feel guests comfortable quiet kitchenette laundry sofa bed appreciated complimentary breakfast buffet standard residence inn food wasnt busy seating lobby loved coming day sightseeing free dinners weekdays stuffed cabbage meal delicious drawback hotel relatively chicagos main attractions walking distance rental car gps wasnt definitely

Reviews.Title: “We would definitely stay here again!!”
Reviews.Author: PghRunnerGirl
Reviews.Content: chose hotel due proximity university chicago staying city perfect clean tastefully decorated loved flatscreen tv except bathroom fitness sufficient fan ventilation computer available guests free breakfast superb pancakes waffles scrambled eggs sausage potatoes yogurt oatmeal fruit cereal choices restaurants nearby tgif restaurant holiday inn walking distance giordanos

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: keharty
Reviews.Content: husband stayed night check breeze friendly staff absolutely beautiful nicest ive stayed clean kitchen stocked dishes utensils etc flat screen nice rotated couch towards bed lots power outlets cell phones laptops items charged free wifi probably wont traveling chicago time soon definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel at Midway!!!”
Reviews.Author: grensi
Reviews.Content: family stayed night downtown chicago weekend hotel top notch clean pool kids nice variety food breakfast bar staff stay enjoyable chicago midway stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Treated like royalty”
Reviews.Author: bearded_bard
Reviews.Content: moment registered checked day treated royalty staff appreciated choosing stay request towels baby crib handled quickly courteously refused tip saying wasnt king suite separate bedroom 5 plenty daughter soninlaw enjoyed luxurious kingsized bed sofabed living disappointingly soft lumpy queen disinfectant cleaning kitchen fortunately eventually dissipated otherwise suite midweek complimentary barbeque meal baked beans salads deserts drinks minutes midway airport insulated hardly heard planes inside
